detail: Leading the vision and innovation at Solid Home, Design and Engineers, ensuring every project reflects excellence and creativity.
Expert in Mechanical, Electrical, and Plumbing, overseeing smooth operations and technical functionality of every project.
On the ground ensuring every design is brought to life with precision and technical expertise.
Managing the heart of the organization with a focus on people and financial management.
Crafting detailed designs that blend creativity with technical precision.
Transforming ideas into stunning 3D visualizations to bring projects to life before they even begin.
Connecting clients with their dream projects through strategic marketing and personalized service.
